attributes.action: Make Parcelforce accountable to their customers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Thousands of people in the UK are frustrated with Parcelforce's service levels. As consumers waiting to receive a delivery we have no choice in the provider of that service. Complaints go unanswered but there's nothing we can do. Postcomm doesn't appear to be making a difference. This is a petition to make Parcelforce accountable to its customers.
